title: Updated Apt in Prime Waltham Location
posting_body: ['Turn key unit move-in condition with an updated kitchen & bath featuring new appliances, laminated Pergo flooring, plenty of closet space, washer & dryer in the building, with additional storage.', 'An abundance of parking in the complex; up to 2 cars per unit.', 'Pool, Tennis Courts and grill area within the complex.', 'Quiet wooded location with easy and convenient access to Rt. 2 and 95.', 'Less than 10 min drive to Moody St/', 'Main St for wide range restaurants; which also has weekly farmer markets and access to Charles River for walking/running, biking, and kayaking.', ' Other Amenities: Parking (2 Spaces), Other (2 Tennis Courts), Pool (Large Outdoor Pool).', 'Appliances: Dishwasher, Air Conditioning, Refrigerator, Range, Garbage Disposal, Washer & Dryer On-Site.', 'Lease lengths:', 'Other (12 months).', 'Utilities: Heat Included, Resident Pays Electricity, Other (Heat & Hot Water Included), Trash Pick-up Included.', 'Pet policies: Cats Allowed.']
